title: Ally: You can kite the wukong that's already on top of you.
body:
Ally: Doesn't matter that he's moving faster and your mobility is down. You don't stand an AA him.
Ally: I'm just trying to help while remaining completely ignorant of the situation and misinformed about ADC in general.
Ally: I'm a full rank above you. That should count for something.

Everything he said was wrong and he's never going to understand how or why.
